title: Share of U.S. travelers who have had items stolen or lost 2015
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 6.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 6.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
Response Credit card has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The highest Response Smartphone has 6.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Passport.
Share of respondents at Response Smartphone is 10.0 , second place is Credit card at 9.0, and thirdly is Debit card at 8.0.
The lowest value 4.0 at Passport is almost 1.35 times smaller than the average value 7.4.
